data.title: Routes – MAX Transit – Birmingham Jefferson County Transit Authority
data.text:
Routes

Welcome to MAX Transit! Our buses operate on set schedules (approximate and subject to change), stopping at convenient spots throughout Birmingham and surrounding areas. All buses are ADA-accessible.

Bus Routes

Check out the three bus lines we offer to cater to different needs across our service area. In addition to our bus lines, MAX On-Demand offers curbside to curbside transportation in select service areas.

Birmingham Xpress (BX)

(orange buses) is a state-of-the-art Bus Rapid Transit system offering rail-like convenience and efficiency with the flexibility of a bus. BX runs east to west, connecting neighborhoods and popular destinations from the Woodlawn Transit Center to the Birmingham CrossPlex Transit Center. Buses include Wi-Fi (MAX_WiFi), charging stations, and bike racks.

The Magic City Connector (MCC)

(red buses) is sponsored by Coca-Cola. It runs along 20th St. from Homewood City Center to Uptown in Birmingham, connecting to routes leading to many city attractions. Buses include Wi-Fi (MAX_WiFi), charging stations, and bike racks.
